document.full_text: indian prime minister manmohan singh said on friday he had no knowledge of vote buying to win a confidence vote in 2008 and doubted the veracity of the claims, a day after defying resignation calls over the issue.
document.title: india pm says no knowledge of vote buying
lines_and_colors: indian prime minister manmohan singh said on friday he had no knowledge of vote buying to win a confidence vote in 2008 and doubted the veracity of the claims, a day after defying resignation calls over the issue.
